analyzed: yasavatī pamukha aṭṭhārasa bhikkhunī sahassa apadāna

original: Itthaṁ sudaṁ yasavatīpamukhāni khattiyakaññābhikkhuniyo aṭṭhārasasahassāni bhagavato sammukhā imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.
analyzed: ittham sudam yasavatī pamukhāni khattiya kaññā bhikkhuniyaḥ aṭṭhārasa sahassāni bhagavato sammukhā imā gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati
yasavatī pamukha aṭṭhārasa bhikkhunī sahassa apadānam paṭhama
